pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# Installation## Prerequisites- Python >= `v3.10`## Install package1. `pip install poetry`2. Setup and active virtual enviroment with `poetry`3. `poetry add material-zui` to install all dependencies4. Done!! 😁# Modules
  1. bard
  2. bing_ai
  3. compress
  4. crawl
  5. crontab
  6. date_time
  7. env
  8. fake
  9. file
  10. gpt
  11. image
    • grayscale
    • colorization
    • sketch
    • transparent background
    • upscale
    • convert to jpg/png
  12. list
  13. log
  14. network
  15. number
  16. os
  17. regex
  18. replicate: AI Platform API
  19. selenium
  20. string
  21. telegram_bot
  22. utility
  23. validate
# Package- https://pypi.org/project/material-zui
